text: Michel Viaud (15 February 1940 - 10 May 2001) was a French rower. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome with the men's eight where they came fourth. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2001 deaths Category:French male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of France Category:Rowers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Nantes Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for France Category:Rowers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Michel Viaud
